articles.content:
Friendly Meeting Held 
    Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Wojciech Kaluza, Polish ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a friendly meeting at Yanggakdo International Hotel Monday evening on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 93 (2004).
 The participants deepened their friendly feelings, talking about the need to boost the friendly relations between the DPRK and Poland in the new year, too.

articles.title: Indian Diplomats Visit Taekwon-do Hall
articles.content:
Indian Diplomats Visit Taekwon-do Hall 
    Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Rich Pal Singh, Indian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the Indian embassy here visited the Taekwon-do Hall yesterday on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and India.
 Being briefed on the hall, they looked round the cups and medals DPRK players have won in the international contests including the World Taekwon-do Championships through their intensive training to raise the technical skill of Taekwon-do, the orthodox martial art of the Korean nation.    
 They saw the training of Taekwon-do instructors and players.

DPRK Delegation Returns
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Returns
    Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation led by Kim Yong Dae, vice president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, returned home today after participating in the World Summit on the Information Society held in Geneva.
 The delegation was met at the airport by Kim Yun Hyok, secretary general of the SPA Presidium, and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
